title: Carmen
description: Carmen (1845) by Prosper Merimee is the original novella that inspired the classic opera by Bizet. The unforgettable story of Carmen, a flirtatious, charismatic, and amoral gypsy who bewitches and emotionally enslaves Don Jose, a desperate man, into a tragic obsession, has captivated generations with its passion and sensual intensity.
author: Prosper Mérimée
